para.programlisting:
<xs:schema xmlns="http://foo.com/schemas/schema" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://foo.com/schemas/schema" elementFormDefault="qualified">
<xs:element name="Content" type="Content"/>
<xs:complexType name="Content"> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType>
</xs:schema>
